text: Ne wisumilisie halala nende balia balaamanga Nyasaye wabu etsuli nende ingoloobe, nibakhaba obuchami bubwe. Ne olababusiamwo tsimoni tsitsio khulwokhwenya ebirone bio bulamu bwokhushialo tawe. Ne olaria balia abakhwalekha bakandala emioyo chiabu mana nibalonda obwikombi bwabu, mana amakhuwa kabu nikabura eshichelo
